"wadata-ida" kramayata sewaya karana ape karyalaye eeye dawase apa dedena pawichchi kala sewa mesa pihitiye durin wuwada, the koppayak bimata ma kussi kalla paththe giya mohothaka jorj ma kathawata watuneya.

jalaya nam muladrawyayak nomathi wuwa nam apa da natha.

dakunu palathe pipals lisin pasal riya niyamaka daruwanta sahayogayak 2018 juli 14 wana senasurada, pe.wa. 06:00 80 shri lankawe banku nowana pa්ramukhathama mulya aayathanaya wana pipals lisin and finans samagama, janadhipathi lekam karyalaye magapenwima yatathe jathika gamanagamana komishan sabhawa, polis rathawahana mulasthanaya, samaga ekwa pawathwana ‘thirasara pasal wadasatahana - marga aarakshana wyapruthiyehi’ thawath wadasatahan 5k pipals lisin hambanthota, thangalla, akurassa, galla ha mathara shakhawala dayakathwayen hambanthota suchi jathika pasala, thangalla jathika pirimi widyalaya, akurassa maha widyalaya, mathara sujatha widyalaya ha galla richmand widyalayedi pasugiyada pawathwina.
eeth ee ahinsaka daruwa dakke wesak kuduwe aalokaya noweyi.
me nisa laukika jiwithaye diyunuwa, lokoththara jiwithaye diyunuwa apeksha karana pudgalaya thama asurata thora ganna aya pilibanda mana danimakin sitiya yuthuya.
boyisla kiwata wayasa awurudu dahaya, dolahe sita hata haththawa panna mahalla dakwa bich boyisla ada apa rate walla aashrithawa dakinnata atha.
thawaduratath budurajanan wahanse silayehi ha pragnyawehi athi anyonya sambandhathawa mese wadalaha.
ape rate kiri nishpadanaya siduwenawa.
adhyapana amathyanshaya magin 2015 wasare sita bandawaganim saha dimana sambandhayen da widimath piyawara rasak ganu labu bawayi adhyapanagnyayin penwa denne.
anagathaya obe panen liyanna.
penena hatiyata, ෙsrukhya thathwaya sambandhayen mata pirisidu warthawak thiyenawa∙ .

mehidi wadiduratath adahas dakwu amathyawaraya meseda pawasiya.
ee ee kshethrayan haraha owun dakshathawa wardhanaya karagannawa.
lasi malli onna kiyapu widihata wade kala. dan. sisitiwi wada karanne naha.
eeth yashodara dewi rahula kumaraya usmahath karala aapahu shasanetama puja kalane...
